# The Luggage
# Rules The Luggage is a [color=yellow]Familiar[/color]. It is a construct, a box made from Sapient Pearwood and enchanted with a simple command - [color=#1e90ff]it will "bind" to the first person it sees, and that person will become its master, whom it will serve until its dying breath...[/color] Often without regard to whether or not its services are needed.
